title: Where are Mordes Compensation buffs?
body:
With the current changes on the PBE  i doubt he will be seen outside of iron 1 Pub stomps.

Hes strong but not over bearing 
People refuse to see his inherit Counterplay and frankly are too lazy to Counter build.

So Riot guts him but unlike Riven he doesn't get a Compensation buff.

So what gives.

>this is literally just a case of the high elo players whining and bitching because they don't like dealing with juggernauts

And others in here claim that it is a problem with low elo players whining and refusing to learn "Mordekaiser's counterplay". But you claiming that it is just "high elo players whining" is kinda amusing, since high elo players should actually be expected to not mindlessly whine about something. That's why they are high elo in the first place, a combination of skill and _deeper game knowledge_.

>morde is very easy to play around and his build path is very limited unlike the other juggernauts

Tbh, I don't think his build path is actually that limited. I think he gets even more freedom than other juggernauts, but let me explain why.

Yes, he is an AP juggernaut and has no items which are directly tailored for him. But here is the thing: other juggernauts have this item and basically dedicate their first item slot to it, like Black Cleaver. Which is providing them in fight movement speed and armor shred. Because Mordekaiser has no such item, _Riot gave him this stuff in his kit for free_. Look what his kit provides.

Free in fight movement speed thanks to his passive and free MR shred as a passive effect on his E. He doesn't have to invest in it unlike these guys, which opens him up to basically grab any AP item that is best tailored for the situation... He can even invest in items to further reduce his inherent juggernaut-counterplay, which is being kited, by building stuff like {{item:3116}} {{item:3152}}.
